page.title: 04Leisure.
page.content:
To the east of our area is a place called Crown Point. Here people take walks and admire the view across the whole of Burnley and beyond, as it is quite a high hill (about 340m above sea level). They often drive up here on a Sunday afternoon and park their car before going for a stroll.
Just to the north of Crown Point is a Golf Course, occupying about 2/3 km^2.
On the A56 there are two public houses to which people drive from quite a distance at the weekend, or in the evening.
There are also several pubs in the built-up area, but these tend to be used much more by "locals".
